algorithm_technique: Sort the array and pair the smallest with the largest, second smallest with second largest, etc.
problem_summary_simple: Pair numbers to minimize the largest sum of any pair.
problem_summary_technical: Sort array, then pair nums[i] with nums[n-1-i] to minimize max pair sum.
key_insights: Sorting is crucial to identify the smallest and largest elements.
Pairing the smallest with the largest element greedily minimizes the maximum sum.
The optimal strategy involves pairing elements from opposite ends of the sorted array.
